long_description: The Osprey Tempest 6 waistpack incorporates the light and comfortable stability of a Talon pack into a compact design that carries water and a few essentials when hiking, biking or trail running. Two zippered hipbelt pockets and a main compartment with internal mesh pocket offer plenty of space to carry essentials. Two sports bottles are housed securely in padded sleeves with cinch-down bungee cords. Horizontal StraightJacket(TM) compression straps and side stabilizers help secure the load for jostle-free carrying.
short_description: The Osprey Tempest 6 waistpack incorporates the light and comfortable stability of a Talon pack into a compact design that carries water and a few essentials when hiking, biking or trail running.
